$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure a dynamic group for guest users is created |
| Why should you use this? | Automatically assigns guest user accounts to a dynamic group, ensuring consistent governance and security controls can be applied to each. |
| What is the end-user impact? | None |
| Learn more | [Dynamic group membership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/enterprise-users/groups-dynamic-membership) |
